experiment-idea-description: It all starts from an idea. Start an experiment by writing down your idea. What problem do you want to solve? Why, how and what?
agile-experiment-description: Once you have defined your idea and possibly received funding, it’s time to experiment. You can also share your experiences along the way.
experiment-learn-description: After your experiment, it’s useful to collect your thoughts and summarise what you learned, for yourself and for others. Share your lessons learned – there’s no need to reinvent the wheel!
do-you-want-to-solve-problems: Do you want to develop your solutions through agile experiments?
do-you-want-to-solve-problems-paragraph: By using Kokeilun paikka, you can roll up your sleeves and put your ideas to the test. You can start an experiment, apply for funding or share your lessons learned with others
really-remove-post: Do you really want to delete this discussion?
really-remove-comment: Do you really want to delete this comment?
publish-experiment-disclaimer: After publishing your experiment, it is visible to all users. Experiments that have participated in an experiment challenge must be published before the end of the challenge.
stage-transition-disclaimer: You can move your experiment into the next stage when you start working on your experiment.
experiment-challenge-stage-disclaimer: You can move your experiment into the next stage when decisions regarding the challenge have been made and when you start working on your experiment.
learn-stage-disclaimer: When your experiment is ready it is time to move it to the next stage. Write down the lessons learned during the experiment.
what-has-happened-along-the-way: What has happened during the experiment?
footer-paragraph: Kokeilun paikka brings together experimenters, financiers, new ideas and lessons learned. The service is provided by Motiva in cooperation with the Prime Minister’s Office. Join us!
could-not-find-page: Unfortunately we could not find the page you were looking for
browse-library: Read about the experiments under different themes in the library.
you-can-search-active-experiments-1: You can apply for funding and sparring for your experiments by participating in experiment searches. Follow our
you-can-search-active-experiments-3: and get information about new experiment searches as soon as they start.
not-now-will-update-later: Not now I will update later
edit-experiment-looking-for: Edit what are you looking for
stage-2-transition-success: You have reached the experiment stage, congratulations!
stage-3-transition-success: You have reached the lessons stage, congratulations!
